## UniversalLink interface

Data needed to create a URL to a universal search page.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface UniversalLink 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [query?](./search-ui-react.universallink.query.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The query to fire on that page. |
